input.sentences: we went to a local art show . several artists were there . including the artist who made these beaded tops and hats .
several medims were used to make this . i think it looks like a peacock .
the time it must take to make this plate is astounding .
these tiny little pots were adorable .
my favorite was this hand made hammock . the colors are bright .
output.sentences: There was a local art show today and I was told they are including my tops in the fashion display.
Once of the pieces I saw used several mediums to create a peacock.
There was an astounding work of art called "time" which included a decorated coiled plate.
With so much to look at it's hard to pick one favorite but I did find the tiny pots absolutely adorable.
Knowing I could only vote for one was hard but in the end I picked the hand made hammock as my favorite.
